name: Media Emperor
description:
Poland, July 2020.
The Leader of the largest Ruling Party comes up with a political project to re-polonize the media, operating in the country. What does it mean? In the Leader's mind, the Polish mediasphere is dominated by the media, with foreign capital, and hostile to the government!

The Leader wants to change it! The Leader is already thinking about taking them over!

Will this happen? We will see. Already, the Leader only appears on state television and
gives interviews only to state and government-friendly media.

April 2021 the Ruling Party recognizes the independent media as public enemies.
The Leader does not talk to them and does not answer their questions!
